<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_570217_bacheca_1_annuncio</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Annuncio rule </name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// valore della data corrente
	var oggi = new GlideDateTime();
	// valore in formato Date preso dal campo data di uscita
	var dataDiUscita = new GlideDateTime(current.data_evento);
	
	// Impedire il salvataggio del field su data di uscita è successiva alla data di oggi
	
	if(dataDiUscita.after(oggi)) {
		gs.addErrorMessage('Errore: Non può essere messa una data oltre i 30 gg');
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}
	
	})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-01-30 15:47:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6075491d2f4e68108fbcd0e62799b605</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Annuncio rule </sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Bacheca 1" source="x_570217_bacheca_1">a6d003f02f8e28108fbcd0e62799b6dc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Bacheca 1">a6d003f02f8e28108fbcd0e62799b6dc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_6075491d2f4e68108fbcd0e62799b605</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-01-30 16:02:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=6075491d2f4e68108fbcd0e62799b605"/></record_update>
